data.eml:eml: Austromesocypris bluffensis sp. n. (Crustacea, Ostracoda, Cypridoidea, Scottiinae) from subterranean aquatic habitats in Tasmania, with a key to world species of the subfamily

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Karanovic, Ivana, Eberhard, Stefan, Perina, Giulia (2012): Austromesocypris bluffensis sp. n. (Crustacea, Ostracoda, Cypridoidea, Scottiinae) from subterranean aquatic habitats in Tasmania, with a key to world species of the subfamily. ZooKeys 215: 1-31, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/zookeys.215.2987, URL: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/zookeys.215.2987
